body_html: AFAICT one of these functions will be used #15166 for test code, which needs to wrap the API. Test coverage could have helped spot that xrange needs to come from six. I haven't seen precedent in other libraries for this sort of API. Since the TensorFlow team makes strong long-term commitments to APIs, these sorts of changes are oftentimes hard to get in. This one seems unlikely to gain the support that's required.

body: AFAICT one of these functions will be used #15166 for test code, which needs to wrap the API. Test coverage could have helped spot that xrange needs to come from six. I haven't seen precedent in other libraries for this sort of API. Since the TensorFlow team makes strong long-term commitments to APIs, these sorts of changes are oftentimes hard to get in. This one seems unlikely to gain the support that's required.
